00019 bool mapLine(MavenCompiler* c, string line) {
00020         // ignore blank lines
00021         line = trim(line);
00022         if(line == "")
00023                 return true;
00024         
00025         // we split the line up into smart tokens
00026         StringList tokens = smartTokens(line);
00027         
00028         // this could be an import
00029         if(tokens[0] == "import") {
00030                 // we might need to import all
00031                 if(tokens[1].find("*") != string::npos)
00032                         return importAll(c, tokens[1], false);
00033                 
00034                 string importlocation = locateImport(c, tokens[1]);
00035                 if(alreadyImported(c, importlocation))
00036                         return true;
00037                 
00038                 string thisFile = c->currentFile;
00039                 string thisNamespace = c->currentNamespace;
00040                 int thisLine = c->lineNumber;
00041                 c->imports->push(importlocation);
00042                 ++c->totalFiles;
00043                 compileFile(c, importlocation, MAVEN_ONLY_MAP);
00044                 return resetCurrent(c, thisFile, thisNamespace, thisLine);
00045         }
00046         
00047         // this could be a namespace
00048         if(tokens[0] == "namespace") {
00049                 if(tokens.length() == 1) {
00050                         pushError(c, "Namespace name expected after 'namespace'");
00051                         return false;
00052                 }
00053                 pushNamespace(c, tokens[1]);
00054                 return true;
00055         }
00056         
00057         // this could be registering a new variable
00058         MavenVariable var;
00059         if(isRegisteringVariable(c, tokens))
00060                 return registerVariable(c, tokens, false, var);
00061         else if(tokens[0] == "external") {
00062                 // external can mean a function or a variable
00063                 if(line.find('(') == string::npos) {
00064                         return registerVariable(c, tokens, false, var);
00065                 } else {
00066                         MavenFunction func = dissectFunction(c, line);
00067                         if(func.name != "") {
00068                                 func.doc = filterDoc(c, c->doc);
00069                                 pushFunction(c, findNamespaceID(c, c->currentNamespace),
00070                                                          findObjectID(c, findNamespaceID(c, c->currentNamespace), c->currentClass), func);
00071                                 c->doc = "";
00072                                 return true;
00073                         }
00074                 }
00075         }
00076         
00077         // I don't know what this is, let the compiler check it
00078         return true;
00079 }
